author: prasad
msg: * goal is a hack for now to create a full menu in the surefire-report.html file generated by the 'generate-surefire-report' goal.
* maven does not include full menu for reports run outside <reporting>
* have been unsuccessful getting maven to include custom reports with it's core reporting.

author: craigmcc
msg: Make it possible to navigate via redirects in the shale-dialog-basic
implementation.  Because we could no longer rely on passing the dialog id
via the JSF saved state, it is passed (transparently) as a request parameter
Thanks to Sean Schofield for the suggestion (SHALE-337).

author: jsdelfino
msg: Fixed logentry to handle the exit of a method correctly, and added the current process id to the trace.
